modes.text:
I'm ok.

I'm ok.

I'm ok.

I'm ok.

I'm ok.

The web page you seek

Lies beyond our perception

But others await.

I'm ok.

I'm ok.

I'm ok.

I'm ok.

I'm ok.

The web page you seek

Lies beyond our perception

But others await.

I'm ok.

I'm ok.

I'm ok.

I'm ok.

I'm ok.

The web page you seek

Lies beyond our perception

But others await.

With searching comes loss...

The presence of absence...

The server is down.

The code was willing

It considered your request,

But the chips were weak.

We wish to hold the whole sky

But we never will

System out of memory.

modes.name: Wait
modes.text:
<pre>The traffic was bad

The cops were very active

Am I late for something?</pr>
